p.span:
Welcome to Bristol Township
School District

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: We are a District of motivated students and devoted

span.style: font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: teachers who are supported by dedicated parents, community, staff and

span.style: font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: administration. We prepare students for their future with

span.style: font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: state-of-the-art technology and innovative school programs combined

span.style: font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: with safe and engaging classrooms at all grade levels. Our belief in

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: “Every Student, Every Day” provides students with the tools they need

span.style: font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: to be creative and empowered lifelong learners. Additionally, we

span.style: font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: strive for equity in education by fostering access and growth for all.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: We are honored to share our accomplishments on our website and will

span.style: font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: left;

span.style: text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);
text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.br: James P. Morgan III, Board President
